additionalnotes.value: Recommended dosing for children 6 and up to 12 years of age: Maximum daily dose of 1625 mg (5 doses of 325 mg). Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.
